section.p: You are spotted by a spear-armed guard. It gives an ululating cry of alarm, and many others swarm out of the mound.
You have little choice but to run - with a pack of deadly killers close behind. Desperately, you try to lose them in the night.

Roll a die, and subtract one from the score.
